rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C185848

self.title: CDISC SEND Microscopy Reproductive Cycle Phase Response Terminology

definition: Terminology related to the reproductive cycle phase determined by qualitative microscopic evaluation.
name: Microscopy Reproductive Cycle Phase Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Microscopy Reproductive Cycle Phase Response Terminology

terms.definition: Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues representative of anestrus.
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues representative of diestrus.
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues representative of estrus.
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues representative of the follicular phase of the menstrual cycle.
In an early period of life or development or growth; not fully developed.
Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context. (NCI)
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues of a primate representative of the luteal phase of the menstrual cycle.
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues of a primate representative of the menstrual phase of the menstrual cycle.
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues representative of metestrus.
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues representative of proestrus.
Morphologic appearance in female reproductive tissues of a primate representative of the regenerative phase of the menstrual cycle.
The period of the reproductive lifecycle indicated by cessation of reproductive system function.
